snippet.title: Buckshot Roulette - Official Steam Trailer | The MIX x Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Dive into the creepy world of Buckshot Roulette in this latest trailer for the tabletop horror game. Buckshot Roulette is coming soon to Steam and will feature new items in the Steam version. The game is already available on Itch.io. Buckshot Roulette is Russian Roulette with a 12-gauge shotgun. Dive into a gritty underworld nightclub. Face off against The Dealer. Brace yourself as you pull the trigger. Load the chamber, press your luck, double down. There's no prize for second place.
